markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Martial Exercise](/Feats.aspx?ID=2256) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 52</row>

**Archetype** [Swordmaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=33)

**Prerequisites**
[Swordmaster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1139)

</column>

---

You've become comfortable in using weapons that you might not have picked up before training with the Swords. Choose one weapon group, such as [hammer](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=8) or [sword](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=15). Whenever your proficiency rank in any weapon increases to expert or beyond, you also gain that new proficiency rank with both simple and martial weapons of your chosen weapon group.
name: Martial Exercise
